ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them.

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away.=
 Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them=
. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and=
 ran after them as well.

"Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be=
 Blender!" Scamrock said.

"Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghol=
d reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

"We left=
 that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

"WHAT!?=
" Stranato yelled.

"It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired ther=
e and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

The Radicons no=
dded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, coul=
d understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's se=
cret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

"Get ready!" Train Wreck said to =
Airbomber.

"What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

"Never mind him." Trai=
n Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to com=
e along while he walked with his comrades.

Dracona was getting furious, an=
d so was Gangon.

"Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will =
still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.=


"Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

Dracona didn't=
 hear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintiss=
a, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret pas=
sage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbombe=
r stepped into a door.

"Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train =
Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

"Yeah, =
it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a=
 table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airbo=
mber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.
=

"Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed =
the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked=
 inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, but=
 it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sa=
t down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

"Oh, man! Not even a drop of=
 beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

"What are=
 we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

"I have more needs than =
all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stra=
nato yelled.

"How come we can't all get along! I don't like it in here nei=
ther!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Ar=
row cowered in the corner.

"You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't=
 stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train =
Wreck yelled.

"Yeah, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all fr=
iends again." Airbomber said.

Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stoo=
d up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to =
look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water =
in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber=
, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

"Say, you guys, it's=
 really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

"Shut up and get yo=
ur ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stran=
ato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of=
 playing cards.

Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and =
out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...
